translation: Selecting a VRM file starts loading and analysis automatically. Adjust the PMX output path if needed, then press Save PMX.
Select the VRM file to convert.
Select a motion (VMD/VPD) file to apply.
Select materials to show or hide.
Specify the PMX output path. A utility-formatted path is auto-generated when VRM is loaded.
Save the already loaded VRM result as PMX.

id: VRMを読み込んでプレビューを表示してください
translation: Load a VRM and display the preview first.

id: VRMファイルを指定してください
PMX出力パスを指定してください
translation: Please specify a PMX output path.

id: VRMデータが見つかりません
材質並べ替え開始(Info): materials=%d faces=%d

translation: Material reorder UV image fetch started: materials=%d threshold=%.3f

translation: Material reorder texture check started: materials=%d threshold=%.3f

translation: Material reorder UV transparency collected: materials=%d transparentCandidates=%d threshold=%.3f

id: 材質並べ替え: テクスチャ判定完了 textures=%d succeeded=%d failed=%d threshold=%.3f
translation: Material reorder texture check completed: textures=%d succeeded=%d failed=%d threshold=%.3f

id: 材質並べ替え: ペア判定解決 block=[%s] pairs=%d constraints=%d
translation: Material reorder pair resolution: block=[%s] pairs=%d constraints=%d

id: 材質並べ替え: 制約解決完了 block=[%s] changed=%t
translation: Material reorder constraint resolution completed: block=[%s] changed=%t

id: 材質並べ替え完了: changed=%t transparent=%d blocks=%d
translation: Material reorder completed: changed=%t transparent=%d blocks=%d
